uncomfortable: There's nothing wrong with a woman being comfortable, confident. - Selena Gomez
Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are. - Ellen DeGeneres
Finding joy is probably tantamount to finding yourself and being comfortable in your own skin. - Morgan Freeman
To be happy, it first takes being comfortable being in your own shoes. The rest can work up from there. - Sophia Bush
A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval. - Mark Twain
Don't let the bastards grind you down. - Margaret Atwood
Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light. - JK Rowling
Remember, Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies. - Stephen King
